original_text: Jesus then said, ‘This judge was not a good man. But you should think about what he said. He helped the woman because she caused him trouble.
korean_text: 주께서 또 이르시되 불의한 재판장이 말한 것을 들으라

sentences.original_text: 'This judge was not a good man
But you should think about what he said
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그가 말한 것을 생각해야 한다
왜냐하면 그가 그에게 곤란을 줬기 때문이다
